## Steps to reproduce

```powershell

1. Install any Japanese IME. I tested Microsoft IME and ATOK.
2. Press Alt+~.
3. You can get the situation.
```

## Expected behavior

```none
Alt+~ stroke should not insert any character.
```

## Actual behavior

```none
Alt+~ stroke insert the '@' character.
```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

PSVersion                      7.0.3

```
